mapper.sql: select a.ctime,a.ownerId,a.ownerType,concat('{\"id\":','\"',a.id,'\"',',\"type\":\"file\"',',\"name\":','\"',a.cFileName,'\"',',\"size\":','\"',a.fileSize,'\"' ,',\"createDate\":','\"',a.cTime,'\"',',\"desc\":','\"',a.descn,'\"',',\"suffix\":','\"',a.fileExtName,'\"' ,',\"reportId\":','\"',b.reportid,'\"}') rowjson from vsa_imp_log a left join (select m.fid,n.id reportid, l.* from sa_file_rel l, sa_file_category m, sa_report_info n where l.bid=m.id and n.fid=m.fid and l.btype=2 and m.type1='REPORT') b on a.cateId=b.aId and b.rtype1=1 and b.rtype2='即时报告'
